script.name: Lib.Cmd.Anarkis.Pirate.Base.AI.Decision
script.description: Pirate Guild - Base AI : Decision Maker

line.comment: * PG Base - Sub AI Script : Decide orders
* Fix 1: Wont try to buy a ship at SY if no SY nearby
* Change (Nicoman35): Decision variables changed to strings for better code comprehensibility
* Added (Nicoman35): Dfficulty dependent max numbers of lasertowers and defend corvettes
* LU Update (Solarahawk): disabled RRF check, not present in LU
* Difficulty: 0=Very low 1=Low 2=Medium 3=Strong 4=Very strong 5=Insane
* Determine max allowed number of lasertowers and corvettes
* Get current number lasertowers and corvettes owned by THIS base
* Determine, if THIS is a big base
* Array of possible actions
* We got enough money, don't need more
* Fix 1 : Won't try to buy a ship at a shipyard if no shipyard nearby
* Check if THIS already built enougn defences and has enough money
* But we shouldn't idle if we have a lot of money and not enough defenses
* We don't need to buy ships if we are big enough
* Big bases have better things to do than TS raiding
* Also reduce patrol occurence on big bases
* We need a bunch of ships for sector invasions
* Small bases not strong enough to invade, weaken or attack stations
* Bases with very low fighter count should only be allowed to get more
* No idle when low on money
* If no RRF we may need to reduce the occurence of station attacks
* $rrf.on = get global variable: name='rrf.on'
* $rnd = random value from zero to 2
* if $rrf.on != 1 AND $rnd == 0
* dim $orders = 'Kill Station'
* gosub Remove.orders:
* end
* Check if station attack is allowed
* Array is clean, let's pick an action
* Debug output
